definitions.body: shine, sparkle (perh. orig. meaning of √, but connex. of
dub.) (NH id. Hiph., fig. senses, [[חִיץ]] n. = BH);—

3 ms. [[חָץ הַמַּטֶּה]] Ez Eze 7:10 (fig.; ‖[[פָּרַח הַזׇּדוֹן]]); Impf. 3 ms. [[יָחִיץ]] Ps 90:6 (of grass, [[חָחִיר]]), Ps 103:15 (man under fig. of flower), fig. ´[[יָחִיץ וּפָרַח יִשׂ]] Is 27:6; 3 mpl. [[יָחִיחוּ]] Ps 72:16, [[וַיׇּחִיחוּ]] Ps 92:8 (‖[[פָּרַח]]; both fig. of men =) flourish.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיָּחֵץ חִיץ]] Nu 17:23 it put forth blossoms (of rod; [[]]—[[ֵ]] perhaps from ‖[[וַיּׁחֵא פֶרַח]]).
